actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to double the amount which may be earned by an individual without suffering deductions from his or her benefits thereunder in the case of an individual who is receiving old-age, wife's, or husband's insurance benefits and whose spouse is disabled.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Doubles the amount which may be earned by an individual without suffering deductions from his or her benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act, in the case of an individual who is receiving old-age, wife's, or husband's insurance benefits and whose spouse is disabled.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to double the amount which may be earned by an individual without suffering deductions from his or her benefits thereunder in the case of an individual who is receiving old-age, wife's, or husband's insurance benefits and whose spouse is disabled.
